SELECT FIRST, SECOND, THIRD, FOURTH FROM BAUMANN WHERE BAUMANN_ID = #{user_Baumann}

SELECT p.product_id, p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, p.price, p.rating,
(SELECT pi.IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE pi WHERE pi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS image_url,
/* 점수 계산 로직 수정: 일치(+10), 무관(0), 불일치(-30) */ ( (CASE WHEN b.FIRST = #{first} THEN 10 /* 일치 */ WHEN b.FIRST IS NULL THEN 0 /* 무관 (Wildcard) */ ELSE -30 /* 불일치 (Penalty) */ END) +
(CASE WHEN b.SECOND = #{second} THEN 10 WHEN b.SECOND IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE -30 END) +
(CASE WHEN b.THIRD = #{third} THEN 10 WHEN b.THIRD IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE -30 END) +
(CASE WHEN b.FOURTH = #{fourth} THEN 10 WHEN b.FOURTH IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE -30 END) ) AS match_score
FROM PRODUCT p JOIN BAUMANN b ON p.baumann_id = b.baumann_id
ORDER BY match_score DESC, /* 점수 높은 순 */ p.rating DESC /* 점수 같으면 별점 높은 순 */
